summary: This is an account signature card from the Municipal Credit Union for an account opened or amended on September 23, 2016. It contains personal and financial information for a primary account holder named Noel Tova A and a joint account holder, with Khadijah Ibrahim listed as the Member Service Representative. The document establishes a joint account with beneficiary designations.

persons.name: Noel Tova A
persons.context: Listed as the primary member applying for or amending an account at the Municipal Credit Union. The form captures their personal details, address, and financial information.

persons.name: Khadijah Ibrahim
persons.context: Appears as the sponsor or branch representative associated with the account at the Coop City Branch of the Municipal Credit Union.

connections.description: Khadijah Ibrahim is the Member Service Representative at the credit union branch where Noel Tova A is opening or amending an account.

events.title: Account Signature Card Execution
events.description: An account signature card is signed and dated, applying for membership and establishing a joint account with beneficiary provisions at the Municipal Credit Union.

locations: PO Box 3205 Church Street Station, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A financial account was established or amended at the Municipal Credit Union on September 23, 2016.
The primary account holder is named Noel Tova A, whose personal details, including address and Social Security Number, are recorded on the form.
The account is set up as a joint account, though the joint holder's name is not fully visible in the provided text.
Khadijah Ibrahim is identified as the Member Service Representative at the Coop City Branch who sponsored or processed the account.
The document includes standard financial agreements for share accounts, checking, online banking, and establishes terms for beneficiaries and joint ownership.
